authors: Stefan Struck, based on work by Tim Denee and Jakob Oesinghaus
instructions:
This sheet for A Fistful of Darkness includes a sheet for both characters and the posse, as well as a faction status and location tracker.
For questions or bug reports, feel free to contact me via mail (in (at) monkeyecho.de) or the Blades in the Dark community (https://community.bladesinthedark.com/u/monkeyEcho).
